mapper.select: SELECT mwmi.ADD_CYCLE FROM MB_WATER_METER_INFO mwmi WHERE mwmi.ID=#{id}

SELECT msr.ID id FROM MB_SUPPLEMENT_RECORD msr WHERE msr.WATER_METER_INFO_ID=#{id} AND msr.CURRENT_STATUS <> 2
and TO_CHAR(msr.CREATE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd')=TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd')
and TO_CHAR(msr.CREATE_TIME,'yyyy-MM')=TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy-MM')

SELECT mrtp.ID id, mrtp.TYPE_NUM typeNum, mrtp.TYPE_NAME typeName, mrtp.DEL_STATUS delStatus, mrtp.WARN_WATER warnWater, mrtp.VALVE_WATER valveWater, mrtp.OVER_WATER overWater, mrtp.HOARD_WATER hoardWater, mrtp.BUY_MONEY buyMoney, mrtp.RETURN_MONEY returnMoney, mrtp.ADD_CYCLE addCycle, mrtp.CREATE_TIME createTime, mrtp.EFFECT_TIME effectTime FROM MB_WATER_METER_INFO mwmi LEFT JOIN MB_ROOM_TYPE_PARAM mrtp ON mrtp.TYPE_NUM = mwmi.ROOM_TYPE_ID WHERE mwmi.FLOOR_ID=#{floorId} AND (mrtp.DEL_STATUS=0 OR mrtp.DEL_STATUS IS NULL) GROUP by mrtp.ID,mrtp.TYPE_NUM,mrtp.TYPE_NAME,mrtp.DEL_STATUS,mrtp.WARN_WATER,mrtp.VALVE_WATER, mrtp.OVER_WATER, mrtp.HOARD_WATER, mrtp.BUY_MONEY, mrtp.RETURN_MONEY, mrtp.ADD_CYCLE, mrtp.CREATE_TIME, mrtp.EFFECT_TIME ORDER BY mrtp.TYPE_NUM

select tr.name roomNum, mwmi.SURPLUS_WATER surplusWater, mwmi.HOARD_WATER-mwmi.SURPLUS_WATER allowWater from MB_WATER_METER_INFO mwmi left join tb_room tr on mwmi.ROOM_ID=tr.ID left join TB_LAYER tl on mwmi.FLOOR_ID=tl.ID where mwmi.FLOOR_ID=#{floorId}
